characters.name: Cady Heron
characters.quote: 'I'm new. I just moved here from Africa.'

characters.name: Regina George
characters.quote: 'You can take that fake apology, and shove it right up your hairy- [gets hit by a bus]'

characters.name: Gretchen Wieners
characters.quote: 'Oh my god, Karen, you can't just ask people why they're white!'

characters.name: Karen Smith
characters.quote: 'My breasts can always tell when it's going to rain.'

characters.name: Aaron Samuels
characters.quote: 'Stupid girls make up rumors because they're bored with their own lives.'

characters.name: Ron Duvall
characters.quote: 'Miss Smith, why would Regina refer to herself as a...'fugly slut?''
